item.title: Alon Aboutboul, Israeli Actor Known in U.S. for Roles in ‘Snowfall’ and ‘The Dark Knight Rises,’ Dies at 60
item.description: He reportedly collapsed on a beach near Tel Aviv after telling bystanders he wasn’t feeling well.
